resources.string: As the name suggests, we are all about the world around you. We want to be your companion on life’s daily adventures. So, whether you want to dine at the finest restaurants, relax at the best spas and pamper yourself with great wellness and shopping offers or discover your city intimately, nearbuy.com makes it happen for you. And that’s not all. From tattoo parlors to music concerts, weekend getaways to international vacations, movie tickets to mobile phones, hotel deals to five star meals and more, everything you want is now within reach.
I have feedback or an idea to share, how do I share it?
We LOVE feedback & ideas. Please feel free to share all your thoughts on support@nearbuy.com.

At nearbuy.com, we’ve categorized and made available a huge supply of offers in a way that they can be easily discovered and redeemed. You have search with multiple filters that can help you narrow down hassle free to what you are looking for. For more details, click here. We also have a brand new app that helps you get personalized offers based on your location and preferences. You can download it on both Google Play Store and iOS App Store. Get it now.
How do I buy & consume awesome offers on nearbuy.com?

At nearbuy.com we are your companion on lives daily adventures- from your favourite cuisines, to the best gyms or a relaxing spa, get all that you love and more! Just register using your mobile number and email ID, you are ready to go. What’s more? If you download the latest version of the app, you will never need to take voucher print-outs! Just buy, show your voucher at the merchant outlets & ‘Tap to redeem\' once you have consumed the service!
How do I contact Customer Support?
You can email us on support@nearbuy.com or call us on +91–7303390416 (11:00 AM to 8:00 PM).
How do I register myself on nearbuy.com?
Our registration process is quick & simple. You just need to register on the nearbuy.com app/website using your Email ID & Mobile Number.
Why should I download the nearbuy.com mobile app?

Our nearbuy.com mobile app is a light-weight(less than 6 MB) and easy to use app, that would give you the freedom to do what you love, anywhere you are. You can download it on both Google Play Store and iOS App Store. Get it now.
